   A sized dialog

      `self` in the following sample is a :class:`wx.SizedDialog` instance.

          b1 = wx.Button(pane, wx.ID_ANY)
          t1 = wx.TextCtrl(pane, wx.ID_ANY)
          t1.SetSizerProps(expand=True)
